benunit.documentation: A family is also known as a benefit unit, and contains parents and dependent children.
benunit.label: A benefit unit, comprising of exactly one or two adults, plus any dependent children

roles.documentation: The one or two adults in the benefit unit.
roles.label: Adult

household.documentation: Each household may contain multiple families, or benefit units.
household.label: All the people in a family or group who live together in the same place.

person.label: An individual. The minimal legal entity on which a legislation might be applied.
